GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v5.4.220
GSD.description:
drm/omap: dss: Fix refcount leak bugs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.220 by commit 9d7af9b1624dd70b67354972d7297429e6372091, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit 09bffa6e519256c6fa1552d6ba1f5d594337a464. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/omap: dss: Fix refcount leak bugs
